Name: Firescout
About the game: Firescout is an Online Multiplayer Shooter Game. Many Gamemodes to Play: - Team Deathmatch - Kill Confirmed - Capture the Flag (CTF) - Conquest - Rush And the best thing is you can also Play Offline with Bots. You are the Killer Make every round a new adventure and show what you can do. Online or Offline Fun Play online with players from all over the world. Or if you don't feel like it, you can simply play offline against bots. Unique Levels Many Levels to Play. Every Level is an other Experience for you. Daily Updates The developers try to bring updates online daily.
